about_the_game:
After a century of brutal struggle against a mysterious enemy, humanity is finally ready to fight back.

This is the idea that brought many honorable volunteers to take part in this suicidal offensive into enemy territory, the first since those beasts suddenly appeared one hundred years ago and forced us to band together under one banner in order to survive.

But that's not your story; you are a convict, a murderer, and guilt is the only feeling that has brought you here. The past week is only a distorted blur in your mind, but you remember the screams and the blood well enough to know that the offer they made to you is probably too generous for a monster such as yourself.

  • Maintain the apparatus from deep within the machine.

  • Make sure the Iron Roland reaches its destination.

  • Talk with your supervisors through the Internal Communication System.

  • Explore the cryptic dreams you have been experiencing recently.

And when the time comes...

name: Iron Roland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Take part in an historic mission that could finally turn the tides of war in favor of humanity. As a prisoner, you are forced to work in the bowels of the Behemoth-class Assault Walker, the Iron Roland, take care of the machinery, discover what brought you here, and, most importantly, follow orders.
